[h1] This Game is one of my all time favourites. [/h1]

Counter-Striker: Global Offensive is one of the best competitive First-Person Shooters ever made. From the Cathedral sized skill ceiling, to the intricately crafted skins economy, this game is so advanced.

[h1] I Play this game a lot.[/h1]
But I am no where near "good" at this game. I still feel like I can improve in almost every way.
Every time I play, I notice another thing I need to improve on.
As well as this, I spend a lot of time and money on the in-game skin economy, over £400 (yes, that's a lot of money.

[h1] But this game is not perfect...[/h1]
The amount of hackers in this game make me want to cry; the anti-cheat is laughably bad, and almost every update to fix this is bypassed in the first day. This is one of the main complaints I have about this game.

Other than this, it's a fairly polished game, with semi-regular updates which add new content and fix old bugs.

I give it a [h1] 9/10 [/h1] The only reason its not a 10/10 is because of the aforementioned cheater problem.
Only doing this for steam summer sale.
Might entertain you for one or two hours
